title: Enable clinic open status to allow appointments

requirements.text: Set the clinic status to permanently open so that new appointments can be accepted at all times

quotes: Clinic ko hamesa ke liye open hu rakho kabhi bhi band na ho
Mere clinic ko opne karo taki mije apoitments aa sake

acceptanceCriteria: The clinic status is set to open in the backend
Appointments can be successfully booked when the clinic is open
The 'Clinic Currently Closed' message is no longer displayed on the frontend

requirements.text: Update the frontend to display the open clinic status and enable the appointment booking functionality

quotes: Clinic Currently Closed We are not accepting new appointments at this time

acceptanceCriteria: The frontend displays that the clinic is open and accepting appointments
Users can access and submit the appointment booking form
The closed clinic warning message is removed or hidden when the clinic is open

constraints: Do not remove the clinic status management functionality from the admin panel
Preserve the existing appointment booking form and validation logic
nonGoals: Modifying the opening hours management interface
Altering the appointment data structure or storage
